title: Lawrence Dallaglio Balls and Mauls - The Best of Rugby DVDR MP4
description:
Lawrence Dallaglio Presents Balls and Mauls - The Best of Rugby 2004 DVDRip x264 aac [MP4]

Laurence Dallaglio, the hugely successful former England rugby captain, presents the greatest and craziest moments from the world of rugby in his first ever DVD - 'Balls and Mauls'.

Lawrence, a World Cup winner, British Lion, Wasps skipper and one of the greatest forwards of all time, kicks off his DVD with his collection of magical tries featuring rugby legends including Jason Robinson, Jeremy Guscott, Gareth Edwards, David Campese, the Underwood brothers and, of course, All Black colossus Jonah Lomu.

He then moves on to uncover the tougher side of rugby with crunching challenges from the likes of Phil Vickery and Jonny Wilkinson. Plus for the first time, Lawrence selects his Greastest England dream team. You will be surprised by some of his selections!
